name: Five Nights at Freddy's in GML
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's in GML
description:
Now im recreating classic Five Nights at Freddy's to test my learnings about GML, so it only has one night with 2 animatronics (Bonnie n Chica) and the difficulty is balanced, of course this franchise belongs to Scott Cawthon and im only making a fangame, so enjoy!

PD: the game has no sound, i should add it in a future update.
